channel.title: Portfolio on David Gadyan
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolio on David Gadyan

item.title: Data visualization expert
item.description: Project goals were to build an AI‐driven real estate analysis platform that models and compares new‐construction scenarios—home styles, sizes, garages, basements, prices and locations—to pinpoint the most profitable builds on each lot.

item.title: Data visualization expert
item.description: Project goals were to deliver high-fidelity, animated data visualizations and comprehensive reports—integrating Python, relational databases, and modern animation tools—to meet a client’s need for a dynamic race-chart animation.

item.title: Classification of industry of firm
item.description: Project goals were to infer the industry sectors of New York–based firms—without pre-existing labels—by matching them to reference datasets and then building a machine-learning model to predict NAICS/SIC codes at scale.

item.title: Gemini LangGraph LLM Agent
item.description: Project goals were to enhance and extend a document‐review API for a law-firm due diligence workflow, adding dynamic verification checks, external ABN/ACN validation, and configurable recommendations—all powered by a MultiAgent AI pipeline.

item.title: Multilingual AI Text Generation System
item.description: Project goals were to develop and fine-tune LLM model to generate text which CHAT GPT cannot generate due to censorship restrictions.

item.title: Quant /Python/ PCA Analysis
item.description: Project goals were to build a streamlined Python pipeline to perform PCA analysis on different sectors of the yield curve and flag which sectors were cheap or expensive based on their residuals.

item.title: Data Science Consulting & Review
item.description: Project goals were to manage a team of AI engineers to develop hybrid recommender system.

item.title: Expert Needed for AI-Generated Recreation of Billboard Publicity Image
item.description: Project goals were to develop AI algorithm to detect billboards in images, extract boundaries, upscale image to higher resolution and change the details in the image.

item.title: Data Expert with R software
item.description: Project goals were to develop and integrate R script into existing Vue.

item.title: AI Models (Aitana Lopez)
item.description: Project goals were to develop AI model like Aitana Lopez (@fit_aitana)

item.title: Data analysis of resumes
item.description: Project goals were to create apply NLP and AI tools, models to analyze and compare two sets of resumes to find not obvious patterns, similarities and differences between 2 major group (High VS Low Value Prospect Candidates)

item.title: Build a Google Vision AI System
item.description: Project goals were to utilize Google Cloud Product Search API and detect clothers similar to ones user of this application provides.

item.title: Deploy ML Dash
item.description: Project goals were to deploy Dash Plotly application to AWS services.

item.title: Need to develop matching AI powered web app platform
item.description: Project goals were to create AI powered website to calculate synergy scores for SMEs.

item.title: Summarize & extracting information from websites using CHAT GPT
item.description: Project goals were to create a website which take as input an url and summarize information from it using CHAT GPT providing keys details specified by client.

item.title: KPI Analysis
item.description: Goal of the project was to extract, store, analyze and visualize KPIs.

item.title: Document OCR & data extraction
item.description: Goal of the project was to extract data from company’s various documents like driver licenses, insurance cards.

item.title: Automated Valution model & Real Estate Bot
item.description: Project goals were to create Automated Valuation model and Bot for Australian Real Estate Market.

item.title: Entity Resolution
item.description: Entity resolution (ER) is the task of disambiguating records that correspond to real world entities across and within datasets.

item.title: Scrapy + Bigquery + Cloud
item.description: Goal of the project was to extract information for damaged cars from a website that did not have proper API support.

item.title: Computer Vision | IOT
item.description: This project was one of the most complex ones. The ultimate goal was to detect driver fatigue and issue warnings to driver via alarms.

item.title: Scrapy + AWS EC2 + S3
item.description: The main goal of project was to develop a web scraping solution to collect data from millions of pages from indeed.

item.title: Stock Analysis
item.description: Goal of the project was to test a hypothesis with regards to stock market.

item.title: Algo rithmic Trading Python
item.description: Goal of the project was to create a trading bot which will trade cryptocurrencies on few exchanges like Binance etc.

item.title: LDA and LIWC Analysis of tweets
item.description: Goal of the project was to conduct LDA and LIWC analysis on Trump’s tweets regarding Covid and few other topics.

item.title: Stock Trend & Senti ment Analysis
item.description: Project aims to create a web-based UI to analyse trending stocks and sentiment with regards to specific stocks.

item.title: Image Back ground Removal
item.description: Goal of the project was to remove background from images of apparel.

item.title: Python Cluster Analysis App
item.description: The goal of this project was to create a tool using which users can analyse data in various ways by applying machine learning clusterization and other methods on specific datasets.

item.title: AI powered Scrapy bot
item.description: Goal of the project was to create a Scrapy bot which will go to thousands of websites from particular sector and extract most important data points like company about page, address, news and specifically employee realted information.

item.title: Recommender System
item.description: Goal of the project was to create a recommender system for a matchmaking website.
